meta.@content: An experimental version of X3D JSON encoding is used for this scene.  Status online at http://www.web3d.org/wiki/index.php/X3D_JSON_Encoding

ExternProtoDeclare.@appinfo: Modified CylinderSensor with children nodes oriented about an arbitrary axis. Warning: ArbitraryAxisCylinderSensor affects children, not peers.

field.@appinfo: shifted axis of rotation from local vertical, default 1 0 0 0
local center for axis of rotation, default 0 0 0
whether to show visualization shape to show orientation and cylindrical mapping of mouse movements by sensor, default true
determines whether previous offset values are remembered/accumulated, default true
Text tooltip displayed for user interaction
diskAngle 0 forces disk-like behavior, diskAngle 1.57 (90 degrees) forces cylinder-like behavior, default 0.262, range [0,pi/2]
sends event and remembers last value sensed, default 0, range (-infinity,infinity)
output event isActive=true when primary mouse button is pressed, output event isActive=false when released.
rotation_changed events equal sum of relative bearing changes plus offset value about Y-axis in local coordinate system
trackPoint_changed events give intersection point of bearing with sensor's virtual geometry
